forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 45, with temperatures rising to around 47 overnight. East northeast wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco tonight, a tranquil stillness envelops the city, marked by clear skies that promise a peaceful rest. The air, crisp and cool, dips to around 45 degrees, hinting at the chill of the season as temperatures gradually rise to a gentle 47. The winds whisper softly from the east-northeast at a modest pace, occasionally gusting to bring a crisp thrill, adding a touch of vibrancy to the quiet evening.

As dawn breaks on Tuesday, the city greets the day with an optimistic sun emerging through the mist of recent fog. Expect mostly sunny skies, with the temperature climbing to a height of 58 before gracefully retreating to 56 in the afternoon. A light north-northeast breeze will continue to caress the streets, making it advisable to dress in layers—perhaps a cozy jacket paired with a lighter shirt, allowing for comfort amidst the fluctuating temperatures. The scenery appears inviting, a perfect backdrop for a leisurely stroll through the historic streets or perhaps a quiet visit to one of the many quaint cafés, where one can savor a warm beverage and watch the city awaken. As you navigate the hills and valleys of this iconic metropolis, take a moment to embrace the serenity that comes with a clear sky and a gentle breeze, celebrating another beautiful day in San Francisco.
